navigators.smart.statemanagment

Class TransferableState

  • java.lang.Object
    • navigators.smart.statemanagment.TransferableState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TransferableState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This classe represents a state tranfered from a replica to another. The state associated with the last checkpoint together with all the batches of messages received do far, comprises the sender's current state
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                 byte[] stateHash)
        Constructs a TansferableState This constructor should be used when there is a valid state to construct the object with
        Parameters:
        messageBatches - Batches received since the last checkpoint.
        state - State associated with the last checkpoint
        stateHash - Hash of the state associated with the last checkpoint
